context_bundle.summary: Rust WeakAura encoder/decoder - native implementation of LibSerialize + LibDeflate + EncodeForPrint. Decodes/encodes !WA:2! import strings without Lua runtime.

onboarding.quick_start: Binary: X:\mcp-servers\wa-encoder-rs\target\release\wa-encoder-rs.exe (1MB). CLI: encode/decode/validate/test. MCP mode: run with no args. Tools: wa_encode, wa_decode, wa_validate. Added to claude_desktop_config.json.
known_errors: Use v:2000 not v:2 for version field
common_patterns: WA wrapper: m=d, s=5.17.0, d={aura}, v=2000
